translation: That which is stale, tasteless, putrid, rotten, rejected, and impure is the food liked by the Tamasic.
commentary: 17.10 Yatayamam state? Gatarasam tasteless? Puti putrid? Paryushitam rotten? f and? that which? The rest refuse? Even also? f and? Impure impure? Food food? Tamasapriyam liked by the Tamasic.Commentary Cannabis indica (Ganja)? Cannabis? opium? cocaine? Charas? Chandoo? all stale and putrid articles? are Tamasic.My father Stale? literally means cooked three hours ago. Yatayamam and Gatarasam mean the same
